name: One Letter Werewolf
description:
One Letter Werewolf!

I only had a few hours to work on this Ludum Dare, so I thought I'd code up a little game for an emulator I'd written for LD33 (April 15th-18th, 2016).
You are a werewolf. You must kill all the villagers. Press Space to transform, but be careful if anyone is watching, because they'll hunt you down even after you change back!
n = normal villager
s = scared villager
a = armed villager
x = player
w = weapons cabinet
W = werewolf
CAPS = they know who you are!

Ratings Coolness 53% Mood#211 3.31 Theme#358 3.52 Innovation#490 3.07 Overall#557 3.11 Fun#570 2.97
